publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1193 Mike Rumbles: St Andrew's Church of Scotland, Gibraltar-That the Parliament notes that May 2004 marks the 150th anniversary of the opening of St Andrew's Church of Scotland, Gibraltar; recognises the valuable contribution that the church makes to the lives of members of the British military population and other expatriates in Gibraltar, and wishes it success with the numerous events that it has planned this year to celebrate the anniversary.

S2M-1193 Mike Rumbles: St Andrew's Church of Scotland, Gibraltar-That the Parliament notes that May 2004 marks the 150th anniversary of the opening of St Andrew's Church of Scotland, Gibraltar; recognises the valuable contribution that the church makes to the lives of members of the British military population and other expatriates in Gibraltar, and wishes it success with the numerous events that it has planned this year to celebrate the anniversary.
S2M-1193 St Andrew's Church of Scotland, Gibraltar (lodged on 22 April 2004) Donald Gorrie*
S2M-1193 St Andrew's Church of Scotland, Gibraltar (lodged on 22 April 2004) Dr Elaine Murray*

S2M-1193 St Andrew's Church of Scotland, Gibraltar (lodged on 22 April 2004) Murdo Fraser*, Mike Pringle*, Alex Johnstone*, Lord James Douglas-Hamilton*, Mr Brian Monteith*, Dr Jean Turner*, Phil Gallie*, Robert Brown*, Karen Gillon*
S2M-1193 St Andrew's Church of Scotland, Gibraltar (lodged on 22 April 2004) Mr Jamie Stone*
S2M-1193 St Andrew's Church of Scotland, Gibraltar (lodged on 22 April 2004) Margaret Mitchell*
S2M-1193 St Andrew's Church of Scotland, Gibraltar (lodged on 22 April 2004) Helen Eadie*
